website_summaries.verdict: Best choice to kill pesky flies of all kinds.
pros: Near perfect reviews when it comes to getting rid of fruit flies, house flies, and other pesky buzzers
Simply spray on a wall or window
Some say it will get rid of other pests too
cons: You will have to pick up the carcasses of dead flies

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Just, wow.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get over how well this stuff works. Not as fast like regular fly spray. I actually started to feel a little bad for the buggers. But after just one application and one day, they were gone. I used this over the doors of each room so I could be sure it would not go near food. Today I think I saw one fly and he was renting the farm with the option to buy. After using this, you will never use another fly spray again. Just give it a couple of days. Results are not immediate but they are impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by our exterminator and I am continually impressed with ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by our exterminator and I am continually impressed with how great it works on gnats. After a bad leak and mold issue, we were bombarded with mold gnats in our kitchen. Vinegar or fruit traps did nothing, but spray this product on the window sills and we'd wake up to literally dozens of dead gnats on the sill. It is messy to clean up the dead flies, but totally worth not having gnats in your food or buzzing by your face all day. Results over night and about 1 month of using 3 times a week to get rid of gnat infestation almost completely. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!!! we had an infestation of fruit flies that came down like a thunderstorm in our kitchen. I tried EVERYTHING from those little apples you put vinegar in, to the tubular Raid sticky things (these worked okay), but I just could not get rid of them. An exterminator told me about the PT alpine pressurized fly yada yada yada, and it worked in less than two days. They were COMPLETELY gone!!!! i just couldn't believe it. I sprayed just a little on the window sill and WOW! I don't know how it works, but IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by our exterminator
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by our exterminator. We have flies and ladybugs that sneak inside the bricks of our old home and come out when it is cold. She recommended spraying a little along a windowsill or she said she puts it on their ceiling beams. It kills the bugs so you'll find dead bugs but I really haven't seen any live ones since we have used it. I put it on windowsills and have to vacuum and wipe up the bugs every once in a while but haven't reapplied the spray yet. My only complaint is it seems a little sticky the bugs are sometimes stuck to the windowsill and I need to wipe them out with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: as the spray does not harm the good insects at all
customer_reviews.text: Wherever you spray this, expect a line up of dead flies a few hours later! We use it in our dairy parlor and just inside the entrance way of our farmhouse. We can use this along with the very effective parasitic wasps that Spaulding Labs ship each week, as the spray does not harm the good insects at all.
customer_reviews.author: MI Farmerette

customer_reviews.title: THE best product for fly control
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, THE best product for fly control! Expensive but worth every penny! Don't buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bug spray to use in my garage where my garbage cans are kept. This summer I was getting a lot of flies in my garage attracted to the smell of roting scraps of food sealed in plastic garbage bags and in the closed garbage can. After reading other reviews I took a chance on a $30+ can of big spray and so far I have not been disappointed. I sprayed around the garage, especially around and on the garbage can and for the past month have not had flies despite 90+ degree days. The garage door is open quite a bit and still no flies. Would give 5 starts except for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff2468

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is incredible
customer_reviews.text: I am a campground manager and live in an RV on my site. I've been struggling with house fly type flies for months, and have tried everything. From those flags, fly strips, regular and electric swatters and the Fly Salt gun. I would cover myself in deep woods off twice a day. Having to go in and out constantly of my RV all day I gave up on keeping them out of the RV. Then I discovered this stuff. Bottom line, my fly problem ended overnight! It is OVER! Hundreds died within hours. This is a game changer for me and honestly I would have spent $100 or more for this.
customer_reviews.author: JapesMacfarlands

customer_reviews.title: $30 to kill flies? Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I had my suspicions about this but one can only handle flies being around so much before you're driven mad. I sprayed the top of our patio table, the door mat and the top of the trash can on the porch. This does not work immediately! Give it a day before losing trust. They'll start dropping... like flies! I'll always have some of this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ITis4Nerds

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this product on WSB radio Dave Baker talk show. Received the product and applied around the inside of the trash can, to test it. Now I was surprised it was a spray and not a gel bait. However 1 hour later no flys in the trash can. Sprayed underneath the outdoor tables, chairs, around the doors. Been about a week and we have had several rain showers, humid temps, The flys have not returned. This is the only product I found to work... Wonder if they got something for mosquito... If so I'll have it by Monday and let you know..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after someone recommended it to my aunt on Facebook. We tried the traps and other things that make the claim to help with fly problems, along with just about every at home remedy there is. I was skeptical and didn't just want to throw that kind of money around to be let down again. I can say that this stuff works!! It is hands down the best I have ever come across! I spayed a little on a can and haven't sprayed anymore in days and always have tons of dead flies. Definitely worth every penny spent on it and will be buying more every time it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Trinks

customer_reviews.title: We use this on the doors and window frames in a commercial restaurant
customer_reviews.text: Flies are so troublesome at restaurants and we've found that this is an excellent deterrent if you spray it liberally around door frames and window frames. It is expensive, but a necessary tool in the battle against the pests. I use this in combination with a few fly lights, that utilize fly boards.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ulicny

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but it works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works !! I live in Florida and during the summer out in the country the flies get bad. This stuff works and keeps working for weeks. Outside inside does not matter !! I finally used it inside for the ones that make it is, and after a week or so I cleaned the film off the window sill. But it kept working !! Dead flies keep showing up a month later !!
customer_reviews.author: ReBeL

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known a year ago this stuff existed. The damn flies are everywhere during the summer months they hover around the trash cans mostly. I sprayed around all the trash cans and as you can see in the picture there all dead. It was nasty to discover so many of them. I noticed when I went outside I didn’t see many flies and I was wondering why there weren’t any flies in our garage well it’s because they were dead. It’s a bit pricey but well worth it. There is no smell, just spray it and watch the dead flies accumulate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than flies dying!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most annoying bugs in NC are these tiny red things. The flys land and then roll around and die but these super itchy nightmares land, die and wipe off with a clean rag. Best stuff ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is a life-changer
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product ever since we moved into this house 5 years ago we've always had a fly problem we couldn't even leave our doors open on nice days probably because there's a cow farm down the road I left my doors open the day I sprayed and the next day there was not one fly that made it alive now I can leave my doors open and not have to worry about the flies flying around for a long time it seems like they go to the bait within a few minutes and it's a done deal for them love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best ever.
customer_reviews.text: It seriously leaves piles of dead flies. I spray it on the outside of the container which holds my dog walking poop bags. I also spray it along the edges of the window frame indoors. Flies that get in die on the window sill, flies that stay out form dead drifts. Seriously the best ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dierdre L Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I had the small flies and the plant flys. I sprayed around where my plants sit and on paper stuck to the wall as recommended. I had apparently brought in a swarm with the plants. Because I was cleaning up 100's a day! That's probably far fetched but Tons of them. Also only used a small amount every week or two of reappling.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if you wanna buy this? DO IT.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the friggin bee's knees. We live in the south and the flies in the summer are HORRIBLE. We would see 50+ flies congregating in just one window area this year and it was unbearable. I was so hesitant to buy this because who the hell wants to pay $30 for fly bait, but I bit the bullet. I sprayed it on every window sill that was out of reach of my 1 year old and dogs, and on the perimiters of the doors outside. This. Stuff. Is. AWESOME. After a few days, all those fly bastards were dead. The money I spent on this was worth every second for my sanity.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Dropping like Flies...
customer_reviews.text: Best fly bait killer I've ever tried! This stuff is amazing! After spraying it around my back yard door I noticed flies dropping dead almost immediately. Soon my back porch was covered with dead flies.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.text: It just works, and the price reflects that. Alpine aka BASF makes the best products that professionals swear by. One can will last you one summer so $30 for a summer without flies? Yes please.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: It's like magic!!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are all true. I researched the type of fly in my apartment and products for it for days and was never convinced to buy anything. Had a pretty bad infestation. The reviews on this product sounded promising and it was the best purchase I've ever made. I just sprayed it on all of my doorframe and window sills, the base of the lamp they were congregating near, and underneath my kitchen cabinets. Literally they were gone in a few hours. It saved my house, my pets and sanity. Now of course you will have to use it again a time or two to break the life cycle but this stuff works like magic. 15/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: joshua brock

customer_reviews.title: Zapped them ALL
customer_reviews.text: Ah ha ha! I won! With this spray I immediately got rid of a horrible “filth fly” infestation which I was hopelessly losing the battle with, using the old technology of the fly- flotter (swatter). Sprayed on windows and ... all gone. Even a few days later, to my surprise, I found more dead flies on the floor below the sprayed windows! Killed them before they could multiply. Highly recommend. Updated a year later: so the spray from last summer is still working inside the house this year and killing flies!
customer_reviews.author: veetee

customer_reviews.title: Unconditional surrender obtained in one day.
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed on the inside of my kitchen garbage can.... Within one day of using this weapon the little buggers were wiped out. I was not even able to have even one of them come to the surrender table because they was all DEAD DEAD DEAD. Fine by me. I'd give this 6 stars if that was an option. Super impressed. Just mad that I spent all sorts of time and money on other options that had limited results.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that works!!
customer_reviews.text: See the carnage!! That’s only 15 mins after i sprayed it on the trash bins!!! I’ve tried everything to get rid of these flies but only this fly bait works! It’s pricey but I think it will last you for many summers...I only sprayed to cover top of the trash bins ... I actually watched them fly and die midair after getting on the bait.
customer_reviews.author: ERRN Mom

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to sweep up A LOT of fly bodies
customer_reviews.text: This stuff DESTROYS flies! Once they land it’s lights out. I like to put a small box with a small piece of sweet fruit Mango, peach, etc on the outer perimeter of where I’m working. Then spray a small amount on the fruit. The flies will go for the fruit and leave me alone completely.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure it is sticky when it hits the surface or it’s bad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased multiple cans over the last few years. They all worked amazingly until the last can .. this one sprays out something clear but more consistent with water. It is not tacky or sticky and just runs down and dries.. i should have checked it the minute it came in, but I haven’t had this issue before .. skeptical about buying again
customer_reviews.author: M Muldrow

customer_reviews.title: I dunno how it works, but it works
customer_reviews.text: I had a mild to moderate flu problem in my home. Killing around 5 to 10 flies a day with one of those electric rackets and a can of raid. I decided to shop for a fly trap but came across this spray and gave it a shot. Never needed to buy the electrical bug killer. I sprayed around the doors of the house and I bought a couple of sticky flypaper traps and sprayed those and hung them. In about a day or so, the flies were gone. I saw some dead by the doors but after that, I really have no idea where they went. This stuff is amazing. Its pricey but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Live near cattle?
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. We live out in the country in the midst of lots of cattle pasture. Always have bad flys of biblical proportions every summer. This stuff, sprayed on the ceiling of our porch, killed 100's of them and made it much more enjoyable outside. Works fast!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product,Use caution and keep away from pets and children. All i do is spray a little on a paper towel and hang it in area up high and they will truly drop dead like flies this product was recommended by a friend and it really works not that i know about it i will use nothing else worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Spray it on an item, dog poop in yard, plate after eating (best if a little remnants are left on plate), sit back and watch them die. Soon as they land on a sprayed area they lick it and within 10 to 15 seconds they start going crazy then do floppy fish and die. Entertainment at its best.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Best fly control ever!
customer_reviews.text: Live in the country and flies are a nuisance. This is the best stuff we’ve ever found for fly control. Also kills gnats, that’s the small things in the video on the ledge. This is after a week. You usually start seeing dead flies within a couple hours of application. I’d pay double for this product if I had to, even though this is not very cheap to begin with but it is a product that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable product! Works great
customer_reviews.text: Did not think it would work so well. A friend told me about this product. You will have dead flies everywhere. I can’t believe how well it works. Spray around door jams, windowsills and general areas where you have flies. Odorless and nonstick
customer_reviews.author: RudiC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! It is so easy to use and works immedatily. The can states to respray every 30 days but it lasts longer than that. I will never go without this product again. I use it on our back porch as well as my chicken house.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Kills flys better than Jeff Goldblum!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Had a bad fly proble that we could not get control of. This spray works crazy fast and when used it breaks the fly’s life cycle by killing all the flys so they don’t have a cycle! You will get tired of sweeping up dead flys!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic fly killer!
customer_reviews.text: Worked around garbage can well. Wouldn't say I had as much success with it preventing flies from flying into the house. Sprayed around doors as directed and didn't seem to do anything but leave a lil residue. I wouldn't say it was worthless just not the magic spray I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Shellynda Michalek

customer_reviews.title: A dead fly is a good fly
customer_reviews.text: I live in dairy country with corn fields beside me...I know flies. This stuff works great. Spray it around your doors and windows, the flies might still get in, but if they’ve been sitting on the door frame they will die shortly. A dead fly is a good fly.
customer_reviews.author: teebreaker

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!!!!! FORGET EVERYTHING ELSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not need to look anymore, this works! I sprayed once outside in and out of trash can, and around patio area. I actually sprayed a few stray flies and sprayed the fly strips that were already hanging and sprayed a trap I had in my kitchen above the sink a few times for the first week of use, I did not see any flies after this. I sprayed just maybe once or twice in the couple of weeks following to be on the safe side, but no flies the entire season! This product was safe to use indoors and out, but I do not have pets, read for pet instruction
customer_reviews.author: E Russell

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor has a cattle farm...I was overwhelmed with fly's of every type. This took care of it...I occasionally get one or two...but I sprayed porches down outside, was amazed. I don't think it actually lasts a month, but it does last two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: mamie norfleet

customer_reviews.title: I guess it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: I see dead flies near where I spray it but I see more flies flying around. I guess it eventually works. I purchased it because my exterminator uses it. I can’t tell if it works or attracts more flies to come in.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Cho

customer_reviews.title: Insect soray
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and I was not worried about the after effects. I sprayed very heavy and then went on a trip. When I came back and the floor in the kitchen was black with dead flies (gross). I was shocked on how many of those little fruit flies I had.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo san diego

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be using it 2-3 times a week. No bueno
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews from other customers, I thought I give this product a try. Once I received the product, I used it immediately at our main entrance of our home and back patio. Woke up next morning and there were a handful of dead flies, but they were back the next day and the spray did no harm to them. I find myself spraying the door and border every 2-3 days a week. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results
customer_reviews.text: We have tried every home comedy and spray we could buy and nothing would get rid of these gnats. A room was infested with them. I sprayed every surface they were on and could land on. They literally fell down and died evetywhere! One day and they were completely gone!! I could not believe it! Awesome results
customer_reviews.author: Mompratt04

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Seconds after they land and start eating it they buzz around and die!! I'm usually very skeptical but another friend told us about it and I have told others to get it now.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seriously works! We live near Turkey barns so we have fly problems every summer. This has been the ticket! We spray it on our concrete porch and around our door and it kills them so fast. It even kills flies for about a week or longer without respraying.
customer_reviews.author: aaron p fouraker

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Had so much trouble with flies coming in ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Had so much trouble with flies coming in the house! Mass invasion every time we opened the front door. Sprayed the door frame, front porch, and window sills. That was about 6 weeks ago and I am just starting to see flies come in again. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Let's admit defeat.
customer_reviews.text: I live in West Texas where the flies are horrible during the early summer. Like most products, this works only on the few flies that get close to it. So this is pretty much a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works wonders, sprayed it on door seals outside abc on some home made traps, I swear we had like 3000 dead flies within 24 hours. It definitely helped to keep the flies in check.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: OMG BEST STUFF EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I had so many gnats and flies, they were every where! In our bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, living room, dining room. I sprayed in each room, and 50% gone by very next day, then day after that 90% gone. This is worth every penny. It even works on ants!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nets Killer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while now, it is working perfectly what it was intended for. Although it takes couple days to show effects. Just spray it under the sink, near drains or any wet and cold areas where there is higher concentration of nets.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: My can of this ran out almost immediately. It is very expensive to run out so quickly. It does seem to work getting rid of flies from outside trash cans.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: TRUE FLIES KILLER
customer_reviews.text: “WOW” this stuff really, really works. At first I was hesitant but once I started spraying and notice the flies were falling down immediately I started believe in this spray. I bought countless of flies killer sprays from department store and none do the job like the Alpine PT. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mekey

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen anything work like this ! I sprayed around my window a couple months ago and I am still finding dead flies daily. I spray the garbage cans too.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Froehle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fly product out there. We live on a farm which is a blessing however during fly season it’s a curse. I’ve tried everything from different sprays, traps to homemade fly repellent. Nothing has ever worked like this. I sprayed one application around the doors and windows of my house and you could watch the flies land on the area and die. That one application used maybe a 1/4 of the can and I have not needed to reapply in over a month. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Meyer

customer_reviews.title: A must.
customer_reviews.text: I have now been using this for a few months ,and wow its amazing, this is now the fist line of defense in the war against the flies
customer_reviews.author: Ton

customer_reviews.title: No more flies
customer_reviews.text: If you want to kill all flies around, use this stuff. You will need to use it a few times in the same spot over the first week and then less often.
customer_reviews.author: Step_private

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a home close to a vineyard. When the grapes were picked we were invaded with fruit flies. Tried a lot of things most of which used vinegar and traps. Helped but nothin solved the problem until we used PT Alpine. Within 12 hour we were close to flyless. Going to make sure I have a supply before next years crop.
customer_reviews.author: JIMBILL

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work.  Much better luck using hanging sticky strips.
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions and when that didn’t work I even sprayed the sills to the point of soaking. But nothing, not a single fly. It’s back to sticky strips and continuing to use the light attractant that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Odie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for flies. Does not seem to kill on contact but I sprayed around my trash cans the next day dead flies all over. I also spray it around my doorways and windows and hand not had a fly in the house since.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nishinaka

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely delivered as promised! I sprayed my trash cans with it and there were 100's of dead flies in it. I thought the price was a bit steep for bug spray, but I'd definitely pay it again given the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jrapp85

customer_reviews.title: Odorless and effective against drain flies
customer_reviews.text: I had just unclogged the house’s main sewer and I noticed those pesky little drain flies (they look like fruit flies) all over the basement, there where hundreds of them. A day after I used this product I literally could count no more than five, all the others were on the floor, dead. After vacuuming the remains from the floor the basement is drain fly free. This product worked for me, it’s odorless and effective. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Panagiotakos

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by an exterminator to repel flies. I don’t think there’s been a difference since we started using the spray as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: texas mom

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get rid of the flies. I would have saved a lot of chemicals if I knew about this stuff earlier. Knocked them down in a matter of hours and the haven’t been back.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Fly control
customer_reviews.text: Anybody who hates flys needs this product its 100% affective to flys and safe for humans this product gets two 👍🏽👍🏽.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but Worth it. Used in our business & after a few seconds of contact the flies drop so be on the lookout bc they will drop anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Queen of hiding packages from my hubby😉

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best fly spray I've ever found. You spray your door frames, etc and they never come back!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlyce

customer_reviews.title: Did not work- disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. I sprayed a plate with a piece of fruit on a day I had a BBQ. I live in an area that has dairy farms. Flys were everywhere and only a couple landed on the plate. I tried putting a couple of plates with spray at different locations hoping it would help. It did not. Flys still didn’t land on the plates. Will not buy or use this product again. It was a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Stalnecker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I spray the trash bins in the backyard the window screens and the are where my dogs take care of business and within a day all flies are dead. However there are some cons to this product, unfortunately it kills bees and lady bugs. The product is great just be cautious where you spray to prevent killing other insects.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!!! Great kill, best I have seen in any fly killer, and the residual kill is awesome too. I will purchase again and I highly recommend it. I plan on trying their other products soon.
customer_reviews.author: Hay Bailer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but works
customer_reviews.text: Sooo expensive but IT WORKS!! I spray in on the outdoor trash and flies drop dead when they touch the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: I had a problem with flies inside my home and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with flies inside my home and called an exterminator. This is the product he used and the flies have not returned. I have not yet used this can of Al[pine Fly Bait and hope I never have to but I have it sitting on the shelf........just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Mamie

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I tried many products and this one works the best. I seen my plumber use this product then bought it on amazon. Extremely pleased.?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that stops infestations!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried bug zapper, bug zapper fly swatters, sonar waves, the new fly ranch, and fly strips. ALL FAIL BUT, THIS PRODUCT. It's safe around pets, chickens, farm animals. I haven't had a problem in days. My sanity thanks you. My chickens thank you. My cats thank you. My dog Kia is a little butthurt, she liked to chase them down and eat them. Healthy choices Kia.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt attract but does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not attract flies. However, it does a really good job at killing flies and insects alike. product_meta.title: PT Alpine Pressurized Fly Bait - 16 oz can - by BASF
product_meta.description: Pt Alpine pressurized fly bait is a solution that is ready to use to kill flies in a wide range of environments. This new formula provides baiting properties which will aid in bringing flies into the treated area. It provides a quick kill with a proven baiting formula for 30 days on non-porous surfaces. Pt Alpine may be used in combination with fly light products such as vector plasma, vector plasma one, and the vector classic for fly population reduction. It is a fast acting baiting spray that is a highly adaptable fly product that can be used in both residential and commercial settings and can be applied as area, band or spot treatment applications. The product applies fast and dries clear with no mess, and leaving no odor. For the best possible prevention for flies, use the pt. Alpine pressurized fly bait and integrate it with other fly control products, such as residual or contact sprays, fly traps along with drain cleaners. New size change from 20 oz. to 16 oz. can. Application: point can toward target area from a distance no further than 12 in (30 cm) and press down. Make a light application at a rate of 2 ln ft./sec and avoid run off or dripping from targeted area. Area treatments are effective where flies congregate, roost and feed. Or areas where flies are likely to congregate or infest. Do not apply bait in areas that are frequently cleaned. This product will not adhere to surfaces that are dusty or greasy. Reapply when bait placements are no longer visible and/or reinfestation occurs. Use a water-dampened paper towel to remove unwanted bait placements and then discard in trash. Read entire label.
feature_bullets: Quick knockdown proven attractancy for up to 30 days kills flies for up to 30 days on non-porous
Target pests: house flies, filth flies, lesser house flies, flesh flies and small fruit or vinegar flies
Ready to use convenient spray application dries clear with no odor
For use in: commercial, residential, industrial buildings and other manmade structures
